review:
Visited Dr. Bhim Singh for shoulder pain on April 2nd, 2023. I live a few meters away from BLK MAX SUPER SPECIALITY HOSPITAL PUSA ROAD and hence first visited DR Gulshan Kapoor, an ortho consultant of BLK MAX hospital, on 28/3/2023. DR Gulshan Kapoor prescribed some medicine but was not interested in my problems nor suggested any exercise plan or future course of action.

But after visiting Dr. Bhim Singh, it would be unfair if I didn't share my experience with him. After patiently listening to my problems, he said that it was not a serious issue. ( I knew it was not a serious issue, but I wanted to know more about it) He prescribed some medicine and promised to send an email with the details of the exercise to be done. I received his mail with all the exercise details in a Word file with pictures and video links.

Further, he cleared all my doubts and encouraged me to clear all my silly doubts before leaving. As I had to go to the Airport, I requested the receptionist to allow me to meet the doctor asap, and she and the doctor obliged.

My sincere gratitude to Dr. Bhim for such a caring attitude and patience. If anyone suffers from ortho-related problems, I strongly suggest consulting Dr. Bhim once before meeting other doctors to save your time money and peace of mind. Anil Varghese.

My father was having knee pain which later was diagnosed as osteoarthritis. I was advised to go for knee replacement for him. But we were apprehensive about going for surgery for him being diabetic and hypertensive. Someone near to us recommended Dr bhim to consult once and he explained the condition and treatment options to us so nicely that we were convinced to give mon surgical treatment a chance. With stem cell therapy and exercise protocol with supervised treatment. He is now free of pain and now able to walk and do activity by himself which he was not able to do before. Many thanks for such wonderful treatment and guidance. If anyone having such problem can consult him once.** ** *****many thanks

I consulted Dr bhim for my ACL injury, I was assessed completely before going to surgery, was operated by team and postoperative rehabilitation was done so nicely keeping in mind my football as sports and step by step I was informed and shown goals achieved..sports related training before releasing me to field by done with him only and I was so confident that I can directly go to field and play next day..so seamless transition from surgery to game I have never heard before..he explained to me that md sports medicine speciality was created for these issues and other for athlete to keep them game ready.. wonderful experience and definitely recommend Dr bhim for all sportspersons going for ACL surgery.. thanks doc

I am cricket fast bowler and was having shoulder and elbow pain for the past 5 months I consulted many places with recommendations of only pain killers. I consulted dr bhim and he examined me fully and my biomechanical and bowling action.i was found to be weakness in my kinetic chain which was not letting me recover.with supervised training and biomechanical correction I am again bowling without pain and much more confidence knowing sports medicine specialist is around to take care of you..highly recommend dr bhim the sports medicine doctor..many thanks doc.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback..glad to know uou are back on field..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My hamstring injury was very bad and even after repeated treatment from various hospitals not getting relieved..I consulted dr bhim the sports medicine specialist and after rigorous treatment finally I am back to field.i had never imagined that I will be back.. but thanks to dr bhim he is specialist in sports and injuries..recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: I consulted dr bhim for rotator cuff tear and i was advised surgery for that..i was apprehensive for return back to game again..but dr bhim gave me complete assurance for complete care till the game day and with surgery and best performance training with him I am so satisfied and recommend him for sportspersons..thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Knee, ankle, shoulder, elbow arthroscopy surgeries,
review: I had consulted Dr bhim for my partial cuff tear for which arthroscopic surgery was advised in other hospital..i was given option for non surgical management given my work profile..I am so happy with results and repeat mri shows complete resolution.. definitely recommend for joint and muscle injury and arthroscopic surgery..

I had neck pain for many years now and I consulted dr bhim the sports medicine specialist.i was explained about the condition in detail and started exercise as opposed to others who only prescribed painkillers..I am free of that pain now..much better many thanks..dr bhim
reply_text: Thanks sonu ji for sharing your experience.

review: I had leg pain after I started running again..i was not getting relieved after I took treatment from many doctors.i started to have pain once I starts to run again..but when I consulted Dr bhim.he explaine d to me about the cause and how to tackle this..with his tretment and back to running protocol am back to running again..many thanks Dr bhim

Sports injuries should be managed by sports physician if you are not getting satisfied results elsewhere . I was given best treatment for my ankle sprain while dancing. I was explained in detail about cause and correction and prevention points in future..joined dance again..many thanks
reply_text: Thanks Ms Soni, I hope you are having great dance sessions.

review: I visited Dr Bhim at gleath clinic for my knee osteoarthritis on recommendation of one of my friends. I was totally surprised by the sheer dedication and time he dedicates to you for making you understand what your condition is and the option you have for your treatment. This is really nice knowing so many new things about your condition and new treatment options available to avoid surgery. Truly grateful for your services and satisfied with improvement. Thank you so much Dr Bhim…
reply_text: Thank you Mr Ashish for your kind words. Nice to know you are getting better, take care.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a AC joint sprain for past 3 months. I tried everything including physiotherapies and some rehab exercises. But still I wasn’t able to lift weights without the pain. Even doctors were pretty generic about their explanation regarding this issue, most of them just shut me down by saying just let your shoulder heal by rest and physio which I did for more than 3 months. It worked but it did not resolved my issue of lifting weights pain free. Luckily I came across Dr Singh Bhim, he patiently listened everything regarding my pain and explained everything. Moreover unlike other doctors his advice was not generic “just rest and do physio” and his treatment focused on healing while actively working out which worked perfectly for me. Now my AC joint feels good, matter of fact I’ve been progressing in the gym each week.
